mapper.insert: INSERT INTO examschedule (studentid, examname, examtime, remark, examplace)VALUE (#{studentid}, #{examname}, #{examtime}, #{remark}, #{examplace})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM examschedule WHERE studentid=#{1} AND examname=#{0};
mapper.update: UPDATE examschedule SET studentid=#{studentid}, examname=#{examname}, examtime=#{examtime}, remark=#{remark}, examplace=#{examplace} WHERE studentid=#{studentid} and examname=#{oldname};
